description1: As Senior IT Manager, I supervised essential IT systems and created Google Apps Scripts to automate tasks for the account manager and SEO support teams.
description2: I managed Google Ads and Bing Ads while providing consultancy to clients' web development teams to improve site structure for SEO, address tracking code issues, and enhance overall user experience.

description1: After completing my apprenticeship with Ocere, my role expanded to IT Manager, overseeing critical systems and providing first and second-line IT support across the organization.
description2: I continued to oversee PPC landing page creation, implement conversion and affiliate tracking code, and provided technical SEO support and guidance to account managers.

description1: I joined Ocere in a technical role supporting the account manager team to help devise and execute effective SEO strategies for our clients.
description2: My responsibilities were expanded after a year to include the management of Google Ads and Bing Ads accounts.

description1: This three-year undergraduate course centred on game design and programming, providing a comprehensive range of skills.
description2: Subjects covered include: game engines and physics, rapid prototyping, design documentation, networking with LANs and WANs, and game production and testing.

designation: BTEC National Diploma for IT Practitioners
description1: My national diploma encompassed a wide spectrum of IT disciplines over two years of study.
description2: Subjects covered include: software development, database management systems, website development, computer hardware, and computational methods.
